issue.title: [CI] MinGW builds broken on Github Actions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10629](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10629). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8542/checks?check_run_id=1411805276

```Java

+ echo '::set-env name=ARROW_USE_CCACHE::ON'
Error: Unable to process command '::set-env name=ARROW_USE_CCACHE::ON' successfully.
Error: The `set-env` command is disabled. Please upgrade to using Environment Files or opt into unsecure command execution by setting the `ACTIONS_ALLOW_UNSECURE_COMMANDS` environment variable to `true`. For more information see: https://github.blog/changelog/2020-10-01-github-actions-deprecating-set-env-and-add-path-commands/
```
